content.text: Charlie Austin (Southampton) hits the left post with a right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right. Assisted by Ryan Bertrand.
Willy Caballero (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Charlie Austin (Southampton).
Foul by Jan Bednarek (Southampton).
Olivier Giroud (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Southampton. Nathan Redmond replaces Shane Long.
Delay in match Olivier Giroud (Chelsea) because of an injury.
Mario Lemina (Southampton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Olivier Giroud (Chelsea).
Foul by Oriol Romeu (Southampton).
Gary Cahill (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) right footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Willian following a fast break.
Ryan Bertrand (Southampton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Goal!  Chelsea 1, Southampton 0. Olivier Giroud (Chelsea) right footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Attempt blocked. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Emerson.
Maya Yoshida (Southampton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Attempt blocked. Willian (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt missed. Olivier Giroud (Chelsea) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Attempt saved. Mario Lemina (Southampton) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jan Bednarek.
Foul by Mario Lemina (Southampton).
Offside, Chelsea. Victor Moses tries a through ball, but Olivier Giroud is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Willian (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high from a direct free kick.
Willian (Chelsea) hits the bar with a left footed shot from the right side of the box. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Attempt missed. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top left corner. Assisted by Olivier Giroud.
Olivier Giroud (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Maya Yoshida (Southampton).
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
